wikitext.*:
'''Elvellon''' (pl. ''Elvellyn'') is the [[Sindarin]] term for "[[Elf-friend]]" 

==Etymology==
From the elements ''[[el]]'' "star-elf" and ''[[mellon]]'' "friend". 

[[OS]] could have been *''elmeldondo''

==Cognates==
It corresponds with [[Quenya]] ''[[Elendil]]/[[Elesser]]'' and [[Adûnaic]] ''[[Nimruzîr]]''.
